# Presentation

::: {#center}
I am a Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie postdoctoral fellow investigating the consequences of climate change on Arctic marine mammals. Based between the University of California Santa Cruz (United States) and the Greenland Institute of Natural Reosurces (Denmark), my work uses biologging devices deployed on both wild populations and animals held in human-care to assess the behavioral and physiological responses of Arctic cetaceans to rising sea temperatures.
:::
